name: Motor Vehicle Collision Injuries Book
descr: A complete revision of the first edition, this book presents the most current concepts of chiropractic diagnostic workup, injury mechanisms, patient management, and prognosis of cervical and soft tissue injuries caused by automobile crashes. It is a comprehensive overview of all relevant issues facing clinicians in private practice. This edition includes five new chapters and includes real world examples that can by used in everyday practice. With an intire section devoted to automobile collision data, crash dynamics, and human tolerance and injury factors, its extensively referenced from the clinical and automotive crash litterature.
